column1: Total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written to them from Budé but not vice versa
column2: Percentage of the total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written to them from Budé but not vice versa of the total number of correspondents
column3: Total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written from them to Budé but not vice versa
column4: Percentage of the total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains only letters written from them to Budé but not vice versa of the total number of correspondents
column5: Total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains a reciprocal correspondence with Budé
column6: Percentage of the total number of correspondents for whom the dataset contains a reciprocal correspondence with Budé of the total number of correspondents
